Arrays.question: Reverse an Array
Arrays.algorithm: Use two-pointer swap method. Start from both ends of the array and swap the elements until the pointers meet.

Arrays.question: Find the Maximum Element
Arrays.algorithm: Iterate through the array and keep track of the maximum value.

Strings.question: Reverse a String
Strings.algorithm: Iterate through the string and swap characters from both ends.

Strings.question: Count the Vowels in a String
Strings.algorithm: Iterate through each character of the string and check if it's a vowel.
